snippet: The 49ers’ Joe Staley was a slim and lanky tight end when he entered college. But then his coaches wanted him to play on the offensive line.
abstract: Profile of San Francisco 49ers offensive lineman Joe Staley, who is busy preparing with team for Super Bowl against Baltimore Ravens; Staley switched from tight end to lineman in college, move that required him to gain significant amount of weight.
lead_paragraph: The 49ers’ Joe Staley was a slim and lanky tight end when he entered college. But then his coaches wanted him to play on the offensive line.

headline.seo: 49ers Lineman Joe Staley Really Feels the Weight of His Position
headline.main: A 49ers Lineman Really Does Feel All the Weight of His Position
headline.print_headline: A 49ers Lineman Really Does Feel All the Weight of His Position
